=== Contributions ===

==== Ubuntu Manual Project (UMP) ====
As the lead !TeXnician on the Ubuntu Manual team, I code the style, layout, and design of the manual; ensure that the translations are consistent and functional; and wrangle shell scripts, makefiles, and build scripts. I also run the server that's home to <nowiki>[[http://ubuntu-manual.org/]]</nowiki>.
